In 5 years, she wants to expand her business. Her   major challenges include high prices in the market. 

She is happy to get loans from Finance Sudan  through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy items like 'sisa', tea, milk, meat, etc

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
Noemi works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fruit and vegetables business in the Philippines.

Noemi has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional produce to sell.

She has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Noemi would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional produce to sell.

loans.name: Pausia

texts.en:
Pausia is 30 years old and married with 7 children.

Pausia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

Pausia has borrowed and repaid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her general store for 4 years and also earns an income from selling fish.

Pausia aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Andranik

texts.en:
Andranik lives in Kechut village with his parents. For many years Andranik's parents have been involved in cattle breeding. Now Andranik is also involved in agriculture and plans to expand the family farm. 

With the help of this loan he will purchase a cow and two calves. These changes will significantly support Andranik in making the farm more profitable and investing in its further development.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and two calves

location.town: Kechut village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is 56 years old and married with six children. Concepcion works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell.

Concepcion has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns income from food vending.

Concepcion aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell

loans.name: Simiren

texts.en:
Simiren is 32 years old. He is married to Eunice, who also earns an income. They are blessed with four children aged 12, 8, 6 and 2 years.

He has been involved in farming activity for the last four years and earns a monthly income of 5,000 KES. This is his sixth loan from KADET Ltd, after successfully paying back his previous loans. He plans to use the loan amount to purchase more farm inputs for use in his farm for better yields. 

The profit he gets will help him educate his kids. His dreams are to have a big farm and to create an income for his family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Sona's Group

texts.en:
Living in a thatched roof house in a rural village of the Kandal Stoeng district, Sona is 42 and a married woman. She and her husband have three children, one daughter and two sons, two of whom are still dependent on them. They have struggled to feed their children through farming rice on 2 hectares of farmland and working as a construction worker. Together, they can earn about KHR20,000 per day to meet the family’s needs from the businesses that they have been with for several years. 

This is Sona's first group microloan with VisionFund. Sona’s group consists of four members who all are female. She is leading her group to ask for a loan of KHR 160,000 each. Sona will use her portion to build a proper toilet for her family. She hopes that the entire family’s hygiene will improve.

loans.use: To build a proper toilet for her family's good hygiene

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en: Veronica is 49 and a mother of four. She engages in hog-raising to help her husband in earning income to satisfy their needs and finance the education of their children. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, Veronica aims to improve and strengthen the business to make it a viable source of income. Since she has inadequate capital, she is requesting an additional P40,000 to buy feeds, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. Through patience and hard work, she believes that she will be able to make an improvement in the business and hopes that she will become successful someday as she continues to work hard and endure hardships in life.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is 76 years old and married with one child. She has been operating a cereals business, and farming, as her primary and secondary businesses for the last 27 years. She earns a monthly income of KES 17,500.

She has applied for her second loan of KES 50,000 from KADET LTD. She plans to use the money to purchase more stock of maize, beans and peas. 

She will invest the anticipated profits back into her business. Her future dreams are to have a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase more maize, beans and peas, and seedlings and fertilizer .

loans.name: Tserendolgor

texts.en: Ms. Tserendolgor, 31, is an accountant with a private company. She is unmarried, and she lives with her sister in a ger, which is a Mongolian traditional nomadic yurt. She lives in Ulaanbaatar, which is the capital city of Mongolia. Her sister works as a janitor at a kindergarten and earns very little money.  She will be married soon, so she will need a new house for her family. She started to build her house last spring with the help of some hired builders. Her house is being built with bricks for stability. But suddenly, she has encountered a money shortage to purchase the rest of the building materials. Now, she wants to make the walls' insulation by foam and cement in order to have a warm house and prevent heat loss. In Mongolia, the winter temperatures are frigid, with the average temperature being -35 C minimum. Most Mongolians use coal-burning stoves to just stay warm in their homes. Tserendolgor believes she will probably not use a coal-burning furnace at her new house if she designs her home smartly. Also, she knows that it’s a good idea to save the environment and protect people’s health. The loan she is taking out will be dedicated to buying some wall insulation materials for her house.

loans.use: To buy some wall insulation materials for her house

loans.name: Filomina

texts.en:
Filomina is 36 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Filomina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store. She earns additional income from motorcycle transport.

Filomina has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, noodles, eggs, sugar, milk, etc.

In the future Filomina would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena pertenece al Banco Comunal Kausachun, tiene 32 años de edad, es casada y madre de 3 hijos varones. Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 10 años y se dedica a la fabricación de ladrillos.  En este tiempo como socia de FINCA Perú, Elena ha aprendido la importancia de los ahorros y la puntualidad. Su sueño para el futuro es que sus hijos progresen y puedan tener logros más grandes que los de ella. Su meta es comprar un terreno donde pueda construir una casa para su familia y una tienda propia. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en su negocio, para la compra de los materiales e insumos que necesita para fabricar ladrillos para vender.
texts.en: Elena belongs to the “Kausachun” communal bank.  She’s 32-years-old, married and mother of three boys.  She’s been a member of FINCA Perú for ten years and works manufacturing bricks.  In her time as a FINCA Perú member, Elena has learned the importance of savings and punctuality.  Her dream for the future is that her children make progress and are able to attain larger accomplishments than she has.  Her goal is to buy a piece of land on which to build a house for her family and to own a store.  She will use the loan to invest in her business; she will buy materials and supplies needed to manufacture bricks to sell.

loans.use: to buy brick-making supplies.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia pertenece al Banco Comunal Atinchik II, tiene 49 años de edad, es madre soltera de 1 hija. Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 5 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en su propio negocio. Ella dice que su experiencia como socia de FINCA Perú ha sido muy buena, y que gracias a sus ahorros ha podido abrir su tienda en su casa y de esa manera puede cuidar a su hija. Su sueño para el futuro es tener más capital, más ingresos y más mercadería para que se pueda aumentar el tamaño de su negocio. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en su negocio, para la compra de ropa traídos desde la cuidad capital.
texts.en:
Virginia belongs to the communal bank "Atinchik II." She is 49 years old and a single mother of one daughter. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for five years and she works selling clothing in her own shop. She says that her experience as a member of FINCA Perú has been very good, and that thanks to her savings, she has been able to open her shop in her house and thus take care of her daughter. 

Her dream for the future is to have more capital, more income, and more merchandise so she can increase the size of her business. She will invest the loan that she is requesting in her business, by purchasing clothes brought from the capital city.

loans.use: to purchase clothing brought from the capital city.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Married to Lukas, Mary is 47 years old and blessed with four children aged 18, 16, 14 and 11 years. She rears pigs, a practice she ventured into four years ago, earning a monthly income of KES 40,000.

Mary is requesting a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase materials for expanding the pig shed and buying food for the pigs. Her profits will support this project. Her dream is to be successful in the business world.

loans.use: to purchase materials for expanding the pig shed and buying food for pigs.

loans.name: Ste Marie Group

texts.fr: Le groupe Ste MARIE est composé de deux personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Anne Bamitodjou est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Anne Bamitodjou est âgée de 51 ans et vit au Bénin. Anne Bamitodjou est mariée à un conducteur de moto du nom de Ramane. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Anne Bamitodjou vit ensemble avec son mari et ses  enfants et assure ensemble avec  son mari les charges de la maison. Afin d’assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Anne Bamitodjou vend depuis une vingtaine d’année, du maïs et des bois de chauffage à son domicile. Anne Bamitodjou s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Anne Bamitodjou sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe Ste MARIE, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group Ste. MARIE comprises two persons who reside in the same district. The group's representative, Anne Bamitodjou, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 51 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a 'moto' driver named Ramane. They have two children, both in school and in their care. Anne Bamitodjou lives together with her husband and children and jointly ensures along with her husband that the household expenses are covered. 

To ensure the household expenses are covered, Anne Bamitodjou has been selling corn and firewood from her home for about twenty years. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Anne Bamitodjou, along with the other members of the group Ste. MARIE, is requesting a loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood

loans.name: Nuruila

texts.ru: Нуруйле 52 года, замужем, имеет четверых детей. С 2008 года, в качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, Нуруйла начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорству и настойчивости, на сегодняшний день,  ее хозяйство насчитывает 2 дойные коровы, 20 овец, 4 лошади и  приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нуруйла обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец . В бизнес – планах Нуруйли - увеличение хозяйства и расширение своего бизнеса, а в семейных – женитьба второго сына.
texts.en: Nuruila is 52 years old, married and has four children.  To provide a source of income for her family, she started her own business in animal husbandry and farming in 2008 with an initial sum of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to persistence and hard work, today her business contains two dairy cows, twenty sheep and four horses, and yields about 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and meat products.  In order to further develop her business, Nuruila requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy sheep.  Her business plans are to increase her farm and expand her business, and family plans are to hold a wedding for her second son.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Kim's Group

texts.en: Being a responsible mother of six children, Kim is 41 years old. She needs to support her three sons as they are still in school. To overcome her family's hardships, she and her husband have been farming paddy rice on one hectare of land and raising animals (chickens and cows) for several years. She is able to earn about KHR 10,000 per day to meet her family’s needs. Kim is leading her group of six members, who live in the same village of the Kandal Stoeng district of Kandal province. They are applying for their first loan with VisionFund in the amount of KHR 160,000 each. She is going to use her portion to construct an above-the-ground shelter for her family's toilet. She hopes to improve the hygienic conditions of her family.

loans.use: To construct a toilet for her family

loans.name: Fe De Los Porteños Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Fe de los Porteños” está conformado por 18 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; feriantes, venta de artículos para la cocina, tejidos, venta de productos de belleza, venta de herramientas, venta de frutos secos, servicios entre otros. Todos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Viña del Mar.
Patricia, integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en primera fila, ocupando el segundo lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste chaqueta y un pantalón de color café claro, lleva puesta una bufanda de color naranjo, en sus manos sostiene unos lentes y su cabello es de color castaño y lo usa corto.
Ella se dedica al rubro de la chocolatería y venta de productos de belleza, desde hace 7 años y 2 años en la venta de productos de belleza. Comenta que trabaja de lunes a domingo y lo hace de casa en casa ofreciendo sus productos, su horario de trabajo lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad.
Su  mercadería e ingredientes que va necesitando los compra en la ciudad de Santiago a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará materiales para los chocolates, específicamente cobertura de alfajor, almendras, pasas, maní, moldes.
Las metas en su negocio son establecer un local en su propia casa, ya que donde vive en la temporada de verano llega mucho turista y sus ventas aumentan considerablemente, además le sirve para generar mayores ingresos y optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Patricia vive sola. Sus sueños a nivel personal son poder viajar fuera del país y a nivel familiar tener siempre la unión de todos.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Comenta que las capacitaciones han sido fundamentales para su negocio y también para su desarrollo personal, ya que ha aprendido a organizar y distribuir de mejor manera sus ingresos e inversiones.
Viña del Mar es una ciudad y comuna ubicada en el litoral central de Chile, conocida como la Ciudad Jardín debido a los jardines y patios que poseen algunas viviendas antiguas de la ciudad. También es considerada la capital turística de Chile.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Fe de los Porteños" it is made up of 18 entrepreneurs who all make a living dedicating themselves to different businesses, including: fairgrounds, selling items for the kitchen, weaving, selling beauty products, selling tools, selling dry fruit, as well as providing various services. All of the group members are from the city of Viña del Mar.

Patricia, a member of the communal bank, can be found in the photo sitting in the first row, the second person in from the right side. She is wearing a jacket and brown pants, with an orange scarf. She is holding in her hands glasses and her hair is brown, in a short cut.  

She makes a living making chocolates and selling beauty products. She has had the chocolate business for seven years and has been selling beauty products for 2 years. She works Monday to Sunday, and goes from house to house offering her products. Her work hours depend on when she is available.  

The merchandise and ingredients that she needs, she buys in the city of Santiago for lower prices, which helps her economically. 

With the loan she is going to buy materials for making chocolates, specifically topping for traditional cookies called "alfajor", almonds, raisins, peanuts and molds. 

The goals she has for her business are to establish a sales location out of her home, because in the summertime where she lives there are  a lot of tourists and her sales increase considerably. It would also help her to increase her income and improve her quality of life.    

Patricia lives by herself. Her personal goals are to travel outside of the country, and regarding her family that they will always be well connected. 

She is very happy and thankful for the opportunity provided by 'Fondo Esperanza', because it is allowing her to invest in her business. She said that the trainings have been essential for her business and also for her personal development; she has learned to organize and distribute her income and investments in a more efficient way. 

Viña del Mar is a city and community located literally in the center of Chile. It is known as the city of gardens because of the gardens and patios that are found in some of the older houses in the city. It is also considered to be the tourism capital of Chile.

loans.use: to buy materials for making chocolates, specifically topping for "alfajors" (a traditional cookie), almonds, raisins, peanuts and chocolate molds.

loans.name: Mary Jaen

texts.en: Mary Jaen is from Baliangao, Misamis Occidental. She is 21 years old. Mary Jaen is married and has two kids. Mary Jaen plants, harvests and sells bananas for a living. Mary Jaen has been in her business for 2 years and earns 3,800  PHP a month for these activities. Mary Jaen is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2010, Mary Jaen joined GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a very hardworking man.  He practices farming.   He grows tree seedlings and rears cows and rabbits.  

He has used his previous loans from Faulu Kenya to improve his farming.  He used the money to buy animal feed and a cow. He always repays his loan well, and this gives his group members the confidence to guarantee his loan.

He has requested a loan of KES 100,000 to buy more animal feed and open a business for selling charcoal.

loans.use: To buy animal feed and open a new business for selling charcoal

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 47 years old. She sells cows, and she has spent 20 years running her business. 

She wants the loan to buy more cows to sell. The profits will be used to buy a house as her residence.

loans.use: To buy more cows to sell.

loans.name: Lita

texts.en:
Lita is 52 years old and blessed with five grown children. They live harmoniously in a village, planting and harvesting rice and vegetables and raising livestock for sale. With the support of her husband, Lita aims to uplift their living status to educate their children and give them a better life.

In this regard, Lita is requesting a loan of P30,000.00 to improve her hog-raising business through the purchase of feeds, vitamins, additional piglets to raise and materials needed to improve the pig pen. She believes that her loan will enable her to improve the business and hopes that she will become successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Mairamkul

texts.ru: Майрамкул 45 лет, замужем, имеет троих детей. С 1992 года, в качестве источника дохода для своей семьи, Майрамкул ведет свой бизнес в животноводстве, начав со стартовой суммы в 1,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорству и настойчивости, на сегодняшний день,  ее хозяйство насчитывает 1 бычка и 5 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Майрамкул обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 бычков. В бизнес – планах Майрамкул - увеличение хозяйства и расширение своего бизнеса, а в семейных – накопить сбережения для оплаты обучения младшей дочери.
texts.en: Mairamkul is 45 years old, married and has three children.  To provide a source of income for her family, she started her own business in animal husbandry and farming in 1992 with an initial sum of 1,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to persistence and hard work, today her business contains one bull and five sheep.  In order to further develop her business, Mairamkul requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy two bulls.  Her business plans are to increase her farm and expand her business, and family plans are to save money in order to pay for her youngest daughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Abdukahor

texts.ru:
Абдукахор проживает в городе Вахдат. Он 47 - летний женатый мужчина. Абдукахор самостоятельный и целеустремленный человек. Он является отцом пятерых детей. 
Абдукахор занимается торговлей тканей. Первый раз он начал свою бизнес 2009 году, арендуя торговую точку на рынке. Сейчас у Абдукахора небольшой магазин. Он занимается продажей разноцветных тканей, однотонных материалов и платков. Также он занимается торговлей национальных платьев и штанов. 
Абдукахор просит кредит для покупки тканей с целью увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Abdukahor lives in the city of Vahdat.  He is a 47 year-old married man.  Abdukahor is an independent and goal-oriented person.  He is a father of five children.  Abdukahor is involved in selling fabrics.  He started his business in 2009 and was leasing a retail outlet at a market.  Now, Abdukahor has a small store.  He sells colorful and monotone fabrics and scarves.  He also sells national dresses and pants.  Abdukahor is requesting this loan to purchase fabrics in order to increase his goods turnover.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics

loans.name: Telvina

texts.es:
Telvina forma parte del Banco Comunal “Villa Unida” perteneciente a la ciudad de San Javier.
Ella se dedica al rubro de botillería y venta de almacén, desde hace 13 años. Comenta  que tiene habilitado un local en su casa, se desempeña en sus labores de botillería – almacén de lunes a domingo y  su horario es de lunes a jueves desde las 10ºº hasta la 01ºº am, viernes y sábado que son los días de más venta atiende desde las 10ºº hasta las 03ººam.
Su mercadería la compra en distribuidoras de licores y bebidas, supermercado para abastecer su almacén y bodegas donde encuentra su mercadería a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará bebidas, licores, detergente, jugos, lácteos, para abastecer su negocio.
Una de las metas de Telvina en su negocio, es terminar de arreglarlo, ya que se le llueve el techo, y poder atender a su clientela de forma tranquila, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Telvina vive junto a sus 2 hijos de 33 y 26 años de edad quienes trabajan y estudian y 2 nietas pequeñas. Sus sueños a nivel familiar es poder ver que sus hijos terminen de estudiar y se titulen y que ejerzan como profesionales, así con esto ver su tarea cumplida, y a nivel laboral tener la posibilidad de agrandar su local y trabajar de forma más tranquila.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio. Además se siente muy cómoda con la compañía de las demás emprendedoras del grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que comparten diferentes actividades, intereses, lo cual también le ha servido como un momento de distracción. Respecto a las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones, ha aprendido administrar su negocio de mejor manera.
San Javier es una comuna y ciudad de la zona central de Chile, perteneciente a la región del Maule. Se caracteriza por ser una zona esencialmente vitivinícola. Los viñedos locales pertenecen a la zona denominada Valle del Loncomilla, de donde provienen algunos de los mejores vinos chilenos, Viña Carolina y Viña Gillmore, entre otras.
texts.en:
Telvina belongs to the communal bank Villa Unida, which pertains to the city of San Javier.
Her business is a drink stand and store, where she has been working for thirteen years. She mentions she has a space set up at home, and that she works Monday through Sunday. Her schedule is from 10:00 to 1:00 AM Monday through Thursday, and on Fridays and Saturdays, which are her busiest days, she is open from 10:00 to 03:00 AM.
She buys her merchandise from spirits and drinks distributors, from supermarkets in order to stock her shop, and from warehouses where she finds her merchansidse at lower prices, which is beneficial financially.
She will use the loan to purchase drinks, spirits, detergent, juice, and dairy products, in order to stock her business.
One of Telvina's goals for her business is to finish fixing it up, since her ceiling is leaking, so that she can serve her customers in peace and access a better quality of life.
Telvina lives with her two children, who are 33 and 26 years old and work and go to school, and her two young granddaughters. Regarding her family, her dream is being able to see her children finish school, graduate, and start working as professionals, in order to see her job is done. On a business level, she would like to have a chance to expand her business location so that she could work more comfortably.
She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity Fondo Esperanza has offered her, since it has allowed her to invest in her business. She also feels very comfortable with the other entrepreneurs in the communal bank group, because they share different activities, which have also provided her with some moments of leisure. Regarding the trainings offered at the meetings, she has learned how to better manage her business.
San Javier is a city and community in central Chile, which belongs to the region of Maule. It is known for being an essentially viticultural area. The local vineyards belong to the area called Loncomilla Valley, which is where some of the best Chilean wines come from, such as Viña Carolina and Viña Gillmore.

loans.use: to purchase drinks, spirits, detergent, juice, and dairy products, so that she can stock her business.

loans.name: Gregorio Antonio

texts.es:
Gregorio Antonio tiene 32 años, Es soltero vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos..

Los miembros de la V.R.C. LUCHANDO POR UNA MISMA CAUSA, se encuentra ubicada en el en el Recinto La primavera, perteneciente al Canton Ventans, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Gregorio Antonio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz  y frejol, además se dedica a la cría de animales cómo gallinas, cerdos. 

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas, insumos para los cultivos. 
Las Compras lo hacen en Ventanas.
 Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafioes como la falta de dinero para invertir. Su sueño es seguir trabajando para salir adelante y sembrar más hectareas de maíz. 

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gregorio Antonio is 32 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province.

The members of the Luchando Por Una Misma Causa ("Fighting For The Same Cause") communal bank are located in the La Primavera precinct in Ventanas canton. This communal bank works in short-cycle agriculture and grows corn and rice.

Gregorio Antonio is a farmer and grows corn, rice, and beans. He also raises animals such as chickens and pigs. 

He is asking for the loan to buy seeds, urea, fertilizers, insecticides, and crop supplies.

He will make the purchases in Ventanas.

The loan will give him financial support to supply his necessities. He faces challenges such as lack of money to invest. His dream is to continue working in order to move forward and to plant more hectares of corn.

He likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizers, insecticides, and crop supplies

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy tools for bicycle repair services

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru:
Хосият жительница города Вахдат. Ей 26 лет. Хосият вдова, у нее один ребенок. После смерти мужа Хосият переехала к родителям и живет вместе с ними. 
Хосият портниха. Она уже три года как занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Хосият любит свою работу. Она берет кредит для приобретения швейной машинки и покупки необходимых тканей.
texts.en: Khosiyat is a resident of the city of Vahdat.  She is 26 years, a widow and has one child.  She moved in with her parents after her husband's death and lives together with them.  Khosiyat is a seamstress.  She has been involved in sewing national dresses.  Khosiyat loves her work.  She is requesting this loan to purchase a sewing machine and necessary fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine and necessary fabrics

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen. a 32-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba, is married and has three children between the ages of three and eight, all in school.

For the past three years Hellen has been operating a general shop with one employee. Having learned about Finance Sudan through other clients, she is now requesting a loan of 1200 SDG to purchase sugar, soap, and many other items.

Happy to be receiving loans from Finance Sudan through Kiva, within five years Hellen hopes to expand her business. Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

loans.use: to  buy items like sugar, soap, etc.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is married with two children. She is 58 years old and lives in Palomoc, Titay, Zamboanga del Norte.

Cristina owns a sari-sari store (a small convenience store) to earn a living, and she has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns PHP 6,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase more stocks for her store.

Cristina is a new member of PMPC. In the future, Cristina hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks for her general store.

loans.name: Kholmurod

texts.ru: Пятнадцать лет тому назад добрый и трудолюбивый человек под именем Холмурод  начал свою деятельность в сфере скотоводство и выращивание картошки и кукурузы. Его основной бизнес, от которого он получает доход это выращивание сельхоз культур, а скотоводство является его дополнительным бизнесом. Он начал свой бизнес с надеждой получения прибыли для содержания семьи и обучения своих детей. Холмурод заботливый семьянин и его семья очень большая. Холмурод и его жена воспитывают 4 сына и 2 дочки. Его жена домохозяйка и Холмурод должен содержать семью один. Бурное развитие современного мира заставляет его детей быть более прогрессивными и требовать больше благ. Они требуют, чтобы Холмурод построил новый дом, а Холмурод не имеет средства для этого и Вы единственные кто может помочь ему. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 2500 сомони  для покупки строительных материалов с целью постройки нового дома. Он будет ждать Вашу помощь.
texts.en: Fifteen years ago, a kind and hardworking person, named Kholmurod, started his business in animal husbandry and growing potatoes and corn.  Growing agricultural crops is his primary business, from which he earns an income, and animal husbandry is his additional business.  He started his business with the hope to make a profit in order to support his family and educate his children.  Kholmurod is a caring family man and has a very large family.  Kholmurod and his wife are raising four sons and two daughters.  His wife is a homemaker, and he must support the family on his own.  The rapid development of the modern world forces his children to be progressive and demand more comfort.  They demand that Kholmurod builds a new house, but he does not have means to do this, and you are the only ones, who can help him.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 2500 somoni to purchase construction materials in order to build a new house.  He awaits your help.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials in order to build a house

loans.name: Theng's Group

texts.en:
Theng is 27 years old and married. She and her husband have four children, one daughter and three sons, all of whom are dependent on them and in school.  She and her family live in a thatched roof house in a rural village of the Sa Ang district of Kandal province, Cambodia,  

Theng earns a living by working as a garment worker, while her husband works for others for a fee.  With her current job for several years, she is able to earn about KHR 10,000 per day to meet her family’s needs. 

Theng's group consists of two members.  This is the first loan for her group with Kiv's partner, VisionFund. She is leading her group to request a loan with VisionFund of KHR 150,000 each. 

She will use her portion to buy materials, such as cement, brick, roof, and a latrine bowl, for constructing a decent toilet for her family. She expects that this new toilet will promote a good hygiene for her family.

loans.use: To buy the materials for building a proper toilet for her family

loans.name: Leonard

texts.en:
Leonard is 26 years old and single. He sells fabrics, and he has been selling these fabrics for one year. 

He wants to use the loan for buying more fabrics for ladies clothes. The profits from the business, he plans to use for savings.

loans.use: To buy more clothes fabrics to sell.

loans.name: Bayanmunkh

texts.en:
Mr. Bayanmunkh, 37, has been running a taxi service for last two years. He also has an auto body repair business in his backyard. He lives with his wife and two daughters in a ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic yurt in the ger district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. 

The ger in winter is cold. His two daughters always get sick from the cold in their home. To improve the situation, Mr. Bayanmunkh has started building a house for his family. He is planning to install an electric heating panel in his new home. As he says, “it is very useful and healthy to the environment and health of the people." Moreover, it is very economical. He can cut the cost of his coal fuel by having electric heating. 

Although Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world, it is one of the most polluted countries in the world. This is due to the long and cold winters where temperatures frequently go below -40C even in the cities. Also, in winter, many parts of the country are extremely cold with snow storms.  Both homes and nomadic tents burn a lot of fuel and emit huge amounts of pollution every night by families just trying to stay warm.  Also, the toxic smoke from the cars is one of main causes of Mongolian hard air pollution. In response to this situation, Credit Mongol offers Green Loans to their clients to make home improvements that reduce heat loss and improve heating systems, and to buy cars that run on natural gas. The loan Mr. Bayanmunkh is taking will cover the cost of a new electric heating panel for his new family house.

loans.use: To buy a new electric heating panel for his new family house.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a responsible housewife who aims to improve her hog-raising business to supplement her husband's income. This is her way of helping her husband in financing the education of their children and satisfying their needs and wants. 

She has been operating the business for almost eight years.  She usually earns a profit of PHP 12,000 when she disposes of four head of pigs. She usually spent her income for her family's daily consumption and allowances of her children in school. 

She aims to raise more pigs for sale, but she has not enough capital.   Therefore, she is requesting a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise. 

Through this financial assistance, she believes she will make the business grow and become viable in the future.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en: Gilda is married with two children. She is 41 years old and lives in Looc, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Gilda owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for two years and earns 7,000 each month. She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase farm pesticides. Gilda is a new member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC. In the future, Gilda's plan is to save her profits in order to repair their fishing boat.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane, who lives with her husband and two children, a 15-year old son and an 8-year-old daughter, runs a hairdressing salon, a business she started in 2010. Gayane would like to improve conditions in the salon and so is requesting a loan to purchase furniture and hairdressing equipment and pay for renovations. This will help Gayane provide higher-quality services to her clients and stay competitive in the market.

Development of business is vital for Gayane to gather more income and save for her children's education.

loans.use: to pay for furniture, hairdressing equipment and renovations of hairdressing salon.

loans.name: Fezere Group

texts.fr: Groupement des femmes commerçantes de la RÉGION CENTRALE, madame Méminetou est désignée pour être la présidente. Elle est mère de 10 enfants dont 03 à l’école. Née en 1967, elle a pour conjoint un cultivateur. Elle fait seule le commerce des céréales et des colas depuis 2001 et cela lui procure des revenus lui permettant de subvenir à ses moindres dépenses et de celui de sa famille. Les autres femmes vendent du soja, du charbon de bois, des céréales… Ce prêt qu’elles sollicitent leur permettra d’acheter des marchandises afin de vendre aux clients pour tirer plus de bénéfices. Elle veut assurer la santé et la scolarité des enfants, agrandir son activité.
texts.en:
For a group of women merchants from RÉGION CENTRALE, Ms. Méminetou is the designated president. She is the mother of ten children, of whom three are in school. Born in 1967, she has a spouse who is a farmer. She has only done commerce in grains and kola nuts since 2001. It brings in revenues enabling her to meet the lesser of her expenses and those of her family. 

The other women sell soybeans, charcoal, grains… This loan that they are requesting will enable them to buy merchandise to sell to customers in order to derive more profit. 

Ms. Méminetou wants to ensure her children's healthcare and schooling and to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy items like bananas and avocados.

loans.name: Apple Group

texts.en:
Neema is 33 years old and married with two children, of whom one goes to school and another is still young.  She has had a fruit and vegetable business for about one and a half years now. She is very hard working; she works from 10:00am to 6:00pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her second loan from Kiva's partner, Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan to buy more fruits, vegetables and a half bag of onions, as well as to pay for school fees and household expenses. She has paid back that loan successfully.  She now wants another loan to increase her stock of fruits and vegetables, and to pay for her children's school fees.  Her dream is to expand her business and provide her children a better education.

She will share this loan with her loan group “Apple” which has a total of 11 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her stock of fruits and vegetables and to pay for school fees.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en: Jean is 28 years old. He has two children, who are one and four years old. The oldest attends school. Jean is married and sells different kinds of clothes. He wants the loan buy more clothes, such as T-shirts and shirts, to sell. He will use the profits from the business to expand in the future.

loans.use: To buy more used clothes, such as T-shirts, to sell.

loans.name: Adela Ignacia

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra: Adela; La socia continua dedicandose al negocio de bisuteria ,la socia elabora lo que son aretes,`pulseras,collares,llaveros entre otros,la socia vende de forma independiente a sus amistades y familiares que le solicitan,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio cada dia,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia,la socia desea poder continuar trabajando.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de alambres para la elaboracion de la bisuteria.

La socia se encuentra satisfecha con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Adela is continuing to operate her jewelry business.  She makes earrings, bracelets, necklaces, keychains and other items.  She works independently and sells to friends and relatives who ask for these items.  She enjoys this business, and things are going well thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day.  She is a responsible and hardworking person who is highly motivated to continue working for her family.

She is seeking this loan in order to buy wire to be used in making her jewelry.

She is grateful for this opportunity and promises to repay her loan according to the agreed-upon schedule.

loans.use: to buy wire to be used in making jewelry.

loans.name: Mariyamu

texts.en: Mariyamu is 38 years old. She is married with one child aged 18. She has sold fish for 15 years. With the loan, she wants to buy more fish to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Mastona

texts.en:
Mastona is 30 years old. She is a hardworking woman with a great desire to progress in life. Her lifetime partner’s name is Abdujabor, and they have no children. She is one of the successful businesswomen in her town. For more than five years she has been busy selling food like candy, biscuits, nuts, tea, etc. She knows all aspects of her business very well. Her experiences and skills help her to develop her business and in this way improve their living conditions. Her husband and sister help her with her business. She wants to develop her store further but her income is small and she needs your help and mercy.
This is the fourth loan she is requesting from MLO. She feels deeply grateful for the economic support she has received to achieve her goals. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 USD to buy goods for her business. She awaits your support. Please help her if possible.

loans.use: to increase the range of goods she sells.

loans.name: Sadriddin

texts.en:
Sadriddin is 43 year old. He is married and has 4 children. He is a person who always falls in a story. Some years ago he went to Russia to find a job but he didn’t work in any good place. As he does not have enough income, he could not buy meat for eating. After returning to his home, he decided to start a business with animal husbandry and in this way eat more meat. Now, he is one of the best and most successful businessmen in the local market. 

He buys cows, cares of them for 2 or 3 months and then sells them to local people. His cows are fat and attract a lot of customers thanks to his plodding. He wants to buy more cows so he can develop his business but does not have enough money. He is asking for a loan of USD 1,000 to buy cows. In this way he will provide his family with better living conditions. He promises to make his payment on time.

loans.use: To buy more cows

loans.name: Gafur

texts.en: Gafur is a 46-year-old man. He is married and has 4 children.  His children love him very much, because he is a careful father. He sells men’s clothes in the local market to earn a living. He has been in this business for 15 years and has many customers since he is very sociable. Through the financial support from his friends, he has managed to grow his business. He dreams of expanding his business and becoming prosperous in the future. He needs a loan of 11,000 TJS to buy goods for the new season. He will look for your help.

loans.use: To buy men’s clothes for the new season

loans.name: Siempre Unidas Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Violeta, tiene 31 años de edad, tiene 1 niño pequeño de tres años, quiene es la razon y motivo de todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante. Ella es socia del grupo "Siempre Unidas"; ésteb grupo viene trabajando su tercer desembolso con la institución, los 8 integrantes han demostrado ser personas responsables y puntuales en sus pagos.
La Sra. Violeta, se dedica desde hace dos años a la preparación y venta de comida rápida, como es salchipapas, pollos broaster y sanguches; todos los días por las tardes se ubica en la puerta de su domicilio para vender lo cocinado en el día, es un trabajo que le toma todo el día ya que desde muy temprano debe hacer sus compras y durante el día empezar a pelar papas y preparar las cremas que acompañan las salchipapas.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para la preparación de sus broaster asi como también en la compra de descartables que utliza para servirlos.
texts.en:
Violeta is 31 years old. She has 1 small son who is three years old and who is the reason and motivation for all of her efforts to move ahead. She is a member of the "Siempre Unidas" ("Always United") group. This group is working on their third loan cycle with the institution. The 8 members have demonstrated that they are responsible people and punctual with their repayments.

For two years, Violeta has prepared and sold fast food such as salchipapas (hot dogs and fried potatoes), broaster chickens, and sandwiches. Every day in the afternoon at the door of her house she sells what she cooked that day. It's a job that takes her all day long, since starting very early she must do her shopping and during the day start to peel potatoes and prepare the sauces that accompany the salchipapas.

She will use the loan received to buy supplies to prepare her broaster chickens as well as to buy disposable items that she uses to serve them.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to prepare her broaster chickens

loans.name: Sat's Group

texts.en:
Sat is a 33-year-old married father of one daughter and one son, bothl of whom are in his care and in school.  He is a citizen from a rural area located in the Kandal provice’s Sa Ang district of Cambodia.  

He has struggled to feed his children by working as a motor-taxi driver, while his wife is a garment worker. Having done this for 10 years, they can earn about 10,000 KHR per day. 

This is his group’s first loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund.   The group consists of two male members.  

Sat, who is the leader, will use his portion to buy a latrine bowl and necessary above-the-ground shelter for constructing a proper latrine for his family, especially his children. He hopes his family will have a good health so as to earn a good living.

loans.use: To build a proper toilet for meet his family’s needs.

loans.name: Norn's Group

texts.en:
Norn is 58 years old and lives in a rural village in the Sa Ang district of Kandal province. She has five children, of whom one daughter is still dependent on her and works for others for a fee. She and her husband have struggled to make a living by working in the local area for ten years. The current business earns them about KHR 10,000 per day to meet their family’s needs. 

Norn has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for three cycles and completely paid back her previous loans. She used them to better support her family’s living conditions. Now she is leading a group of two female members who live in the same village to apply for a loan with VisionFund for the purpose of building a decent latrine for individual family use. She hopes this loan will enable her family to improve their health and general hygiene.

loans.use: To build a decent toilet for her family's use

loans.name: Anzazi

texts.en:
Anzazi learned the food selling business about seven years ago when she was employed in a cafe earning a salary. In this way she could contribute economically at home so that her husband and 7 children could have a good quality of life. But, because she needed to be independent and run her own business, she decided to establish her own food stall. 

Since she lacks capital to invest in this business, she is looking for a loan to purchase rice, flour, and beverages. In this way she will be able to care for her family while still being able to generate income so that they can continue to have a good quality of life at home.

loans.use: to buy rice, flour, and beverages

loans.name: Sara Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sara tiene 22 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y esta embarazada. Vive en casa de sus padres. Se dedico desde muy joven a atender la tienda de su familia; pero por problemas de inseguridad se vieron obligados a cerrarla. Pero, ahora quiere aperturar el negocio que manejaba su familia por cuenta propia. 

Ella solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar la mercadería suficiente para aperturar la tienda en su casa de habitación. El objetivo de su inversión es ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, debido a que ella esta embarazada de su primer hijo y desea contar con solvencia económica para cuando nazca el bebe. 

Sara desea construir su casa propia junto con su esposo para independizarse de su familia para tener un futuro mejor y más estable para su familia y hacer que el negocio de su tienda sea generador de ingresos necesario para apoyar a su hijo cuando nazca para verlo crecer y brindarle educación.
texts.en:
Sara is 22 years old.  She lives with her life partner, and she is pregnant.  She lives in her parents' home.  Since she was young, she had dedicated her time to working in her family's store.  However, due to security problems, they felt the need to close the store.  Now, Sara wants to re-open her family's store on her own. 

She is a requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to purchase sufficient merchandise to open the general store, which she will run out of her home.  The goal of her investment is to help her husband with the household expenses.  She is pregnant with her first child and wants to be financially solvent when the baby is born.

Sara hopes to build her own home, together with her husband, so she can become independent from her parents and have a better and more stable future for her family.  She wants her store to generate an income that will support her baby once he is born, to see him grow and to give him an education.

loans.use: to purchase sufficient merchandise to open a store, which she will run out of her home.

loans.name: Zoura

texts.en: Zoura is 37 years old. She sells palm oil, fish and peanuts in the local market. She has been running this business for the past 15 years. With the requested loan, she will increase her stock of products for sale. With the profits from her business, she plans to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: To buy more palm oil, fish and peanuts for sale.

loans.name: Dúo Agua De Vida Group

texts.es: Dúo Agua de Vida, Este Dúo está integrado por la señora Marlena de 35 años de edad tiene 2 hijas pequeñas, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa típica nueva y usada sus ventas las hace de forma ambulante de casa en casa y tiene todo el apoyo de su esposo, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de ropa típica nueva como usada, y también para ampliar un poco más su negocio. Espera que Kiva le  pueda dar ese apoyo que ella necesita.
texts.en:
Dúo Agua de Vida ("Water of Life" Duo) was formed by Marlena, who is 35 years old and has two small daughters. She sells traditional new and used clothing, and she makes her sales by walking from house to house. She tells us that she has her husband's full support.

Marlena is asking for this loan to buy traditional new and used clothing, and also to expand her business a little. She hopes that Kiva can give her the support she needs.

loans.use: to buy both new and used clothing, and also to expand her business a little more.

loans.name: Solidario San Mateo Group

texts.es:
Solidario san mateo
este grupo solidario está conformado por doña Odilia, ella tiene 53 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo de arveja china y ejote tiene a su cargo dos hijos quienes estudian en la antigua Guatemala por las tardes, quienes primero dios menciona que uno de ellos se gradúa de mecánica este año, ya que por las mañanas ayudan a su mama a cultivar los terrenos  para llevar un buen control porque su producto es entregado en la cuatro pinos  y son supervisados cada mes ya que su producto es exportado, doña Odilia está solicitando el crédito para invertir en su siembra de ejote y arveja ya que tienen prepararado  los terrenos para ser Cultivados.
texts.en: The Solidario San Mateo group is comprised of Odilia, who is 53 years old and works by cultivating Chinese peas and green beans. She has two children who attend school in Antigua Guatemala in the afternoon, one of whom will graduate this year with a degree in mechanics. In the morning, the children help their mother cultivate the land so they have good control over it. Their product is delivered and supervised each month since it is exported. Odilia is requesting a loan to invest in her pea and green bean sowing season since they have prepared the land to be cultivated.

loans.use: to invest in pea and green bean cultivation

loans.name: Maedy

texts.es:
La socia Maedy sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “RICCHARY CUSCO”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Maedy tiene 20 años de edad, ella es soltera y vive en la ciudad del Cusco, la socia viaja al vecino país de Bolivia para traer ropa, bolsos, carteras, sacos, botas entre otras prendas de vestir, además, ella también le proveen de zapatos de la ciudad de Trujillo y también  viaja al país de Bolivia dos veces al mes para traer mercadería. La socia es una joven emprendedora y trabajadora que abrió otro tipo de negocio de pintar uñas a mujeres. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maquinas especiales para pintar uñas, ella va comprar de la ciudad de Lima la máquina de pintar uñas. Su sueño de la socia es abrir un SPA. 

La socia Maedy agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Maedy continues to participate in the communal bank "Ricchary Cusco".  This communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.

She is 20 years old and is single.  She lives in the city of Cusco.  She travels to the neighboring country of Bolivia twice each month to buy clothes, purses, wallets, handbags, boots and other accessories.  She also purchases shoes from the city of Trujillo.

She is an enterprising and hardworking young woman who also opened a manicurist business for women.  She is seeking this loan so she can buy special machines for painting fingernails.  She will travel to the city of Lima to buy one of these machines.  Her dream is to open a spa.

She is grateful for this opportunity and promises to repay her loan according to the agreed-upon schedule.

loans.use: to buy a machine for painting fingernails. Her dream is to open a spa.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura por lo que se ha hecho de experiencia en el rubro y esto le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo se ubica en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y está cercano al lugar donde vive, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es a precios accesibles y de primera calidad pero sobre todo con un servicio excelente; Carlos es un hombre honesto, responsable y con mucho entusiasmo de salir adelante, quiere sobresalir y alcanzar el éxito, por eso en esta época de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para la inversión en insumos por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, herbicida, insecticida, abono, etc. Carlos es de buena paga y asegura poder cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo asegura que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carlos, who is fifty-seven year old, lives with his life partner and their children.  He makes his living growing corn.  He has been working in agriculture for a number of years, and so he has a lot of experience in the field.  He always gets the best harvests.  His land is located in a highly agricultural area and is close to where he lives.  Carolos sells his corn in all the neighboring areas.  He has a large clientele, as the people know that everything he sells is affordable and of the highest quality but mostly importantly, that the service will be excellent.  Carlos is an honest and responsible man who is very enthusiastic about getting ahead.  He wants to excel and to be successful, which is why he wants to increase production during this planting season.  But he needs capital to invest in supplies, and so he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow him to purchase corn seed, herbicide, insecticide, fertilizer etc.  Carlos is good for the money and assures us that he will be able to pay off the debt in the established time period.  At the same time, he is sure that he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn seed, herbicide, insecticide and fertilizer.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en: Domingo is 36 years old, has one child and operates a small store selling grocery items together with his wife. From the family's business, he earns about PHP 7,000 each month. It goes towards their meals, allowances and bills at home. He hopes to increase his merchandise so he will gain more income from the store. His main concern is to generate good income and likewise gain more friends and customers too. Someday, it will help him achieve a progressive life for his family.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, bread, eggs and noodles to sell

loans.name: Viviana

texts.en:
Viviana is a 37-year-old mother who sells livestock feed to the people in her village in Libag Norte. She has been managing her small store for over four years now. She has two children and spends her income on all their daily needs. She is asking for additional capital of PHP 30,000 to increase her stock and expand her product offering. She will use the loan to buy more livestock feed, as well as medicines and vitamins for resale. 

In the future, Viviana hopes to keep generating good income from her business and make it profitable so she can pay for her children's education, which is the only legacy she can pass on to them.

loans.use: to buy more livestock feed, medicines and vitamins to sell

loans.name: Felisa Esperanza

texts.es: Doña Felisa, de 40 años de edad, originaria de la localidad de San Juan Sacatepéquez es madre de 3 niños quienes actualmente cruzan el grado de educación primaria, en la escuela de su localidad, doña Felisa es una mujer comerciante  y con muchas ganas de trabajar ella se dedica a la compra y venta de pollos los dias  jueves y sábado en el municipio de Joyabaj departamento del Quiche ella los compra y los revende a un mejor precio, ella logra venderlos por pares siendo así un promedio de (1,200 ) a esa cantida de pollitos al mes, ella logra ganarle un 25% de ganancias,a parte de eso ella también se dedica a otra actividad secundaria que es a la crianza de cerdos, doña Felisa se siente muy alegre ya que con su ingreso  puede darle a sus hijos  junto a su esposo lo necesario para que estudien , ahora su mayor expectativa es lograr captar mas clientes y viajar hacia otros  mercados para  vender sus pollos, ya que han iniciado junto a su esposo la construcción de su vivienda viendo la necesidad de  ver a sus hijos crecer,  confía en Dios para darles fuerzas y los medios para lograr alcanzar su meta en el menor tiempo posible.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de cerdos para la crianza y luego venderlos y tambien la otra parte del prestamo lo utilizará para la compra de pollito, para luego venderlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en: Mrs. Felisa is 40 years old and is from the town of San Juan Sacatepéquez.  She is the mother of three children who are currently in elementary school in their hometown.  Felisa is a business woman and she works with great spirit.  She travels on Thursdays and Saturdays to the city of Joyabaj in the state of Quiche in order to sell chickens at a better price than what she buys them for in her hometown market.  She is able to sell them in pairs, which provides an average of 1200 chicks per month.  She is able to earn a 25% return.  She also works raising pigs in her home.  Felisa feels very happy since with her income she is able to provide for her children, along with her husband, what is necessary in order for the kids to study.  Now her greatest hope is to gain more customers and to travel to other markets in order to sell her chickens, since she has begun along with her husband the construction of a home, seeing the need as their children grow up.  She trusts in God to give them strength and the means to reach their goal in the least time possible.  She is asking for a credit in order to purchase and raise pigs and chickens to raise and sell at a better price.

loans.use: Para la Compra de Cerdos y pollos.

loans.name: Alexandra Candelaria

texts.es:
Alexandra Candelaria tiene 34 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. LUCHANDO POR UNA MISMA CAUSA, se encuentra ubicada en el en el Recinto La primavera, perteneciente al Canton Ventans, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.
Alexandra Candelaria  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz  y frejol. Compra sus productos en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas. insecticidas, urea, fertilizantes, insumos. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar los fertuilizantes para poder sembrar buen productos. Su sueño es sembrar en grandes cantides cacao.

Le gusta hacer la limpieza en la casa y lavar.
texts.en:
Alexandra Candelaria is 34 and lives with her husband and children in Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

The members of the communal bank V.R.C. Luchando Por Una Misma Causa  ("fighting for the same cause") reside in Recinto La Primavera, which is in Cantón Ventanas.  In this area the main economic activity is farming, specifically the short-season crops of corn and rice.

Alexandra Candelaria is a farmer and grows corn, rice and beans.  She buys her products in Ventanas.

She is seeking this loan in order to buy seeds, insecticides, urea, fertilizer and other supplies.  With the help of this loan she will be able to buy the fertilizer she needs in order to be able to obtain good harvests.  Her dream is to be able to grow cacao in large quantities.

She enjoys doing the cleaning and washing at home.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, urea, fertilizer and other supplies.

loans.name: Olga Visitación

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra: Olga; La socia continua dedicandose al negocio de bisuteria,la socia elabora lo que son aretes,collares,pulseras,llaveros entre otros,la socia vende de forma independiente a sus amistades y familares,la socia trabaja a pedido con sus clientes ,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,a la vez la socia continua trabajando en un farmacia,la socia desea poder continuar trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia requiere el crédito para comprar alambres para la elaboracion de sus aretes.

La socia se encuentra satisfecha con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member is Sra. Olga.  She continues to make her living with a jewelry business.  She makes earrings, necklaces, bracelets, key rings and other items.  She sells the items herself to friends and to family members.  Sra. Olga works by taking orders from her customers.  She has been in this business for quite a while, and it has been going well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into it.  Sra. Olga also continues to work at her pharmacy.  She hopes to be able to continue working to keep supporting her family. 

This member needs the loan to purchase wire for making earrings. 

This member feels satisfied with the loan she has been offered, and she promises to comply with her established repayment plan.

loans.use: to purchase wire to make earrings.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan Francisco de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia. Él se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este rubro y eso le ayuda a obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo se ubica en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y está cercano a su residencia, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un servicio excelente; Juan es un hombre muy responsable, honesto y muy humilde, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le presentan pues tiene la disposición de alcanzar al éxito, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero no posee suficiente capital para la compra de insumos por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, insecticida, herbicida, herramienta, etc. Juan es un hombre de buena paga y se compromete a cancelar su deuda y a la vez espera ofrecerle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Juan Francisco is thirty-nine years old and lives together with his partner and his three children in a house of his own. He works in agriculture, particularly growing corn. He has been doing this for a lot of years and this helps him to always get the best harvests. The cultivated land is located in a very popular area for agricultural activities and it is close to his house. He sells in all the nearby areas and has a lot of customers, because people know that everything he sells is high quality, affordable, and above all he provides an excellent service. Juan is a very responsible man, honest and humble. He is always expecting new opportunities to come up because he is always looking to be successful. This sowing season he wants to increase production, but he doesn't have enough capital to buy supplies, that's why he decided to request Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn seeds, insecticides, herbicides, tools, etc. Juan is a man of word and commits to repay his loan, and expects to be able to offer his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, insecticides, herbicides and tools

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en: Sabina is 39 years old, married and has three children. She runs a grocery store to earn a living. She has been in this business for three years. She also practices livestock farming. Through Kiva's partner, Faulu Kenya, she has learned how to save her money. This has helped her to invest more into her business. Her greatest desire is to expand her business and open other outlets. She needs a loan of 20,000 KES to buy potatoes, carrots and tomatoes.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, carrots and tomatoes

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en: Cresencia is involved in clothing sales to earn a living. She has been selling clothes for over five years now and is happy to generate just enough income to cover her family's expenses. She usually earns PHP 5,000 each month. She has three young children. She hopes to increase her sales capacity and is therefore borrowing a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy shorts, t-shirts, pants and hand towels to sell. With this investment, she will be able to increase her sales and profits to pay matriculation fees on time.

loans.use: to buy shorts, t-shirts, pants and hand towels for sale

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Maria Mercedes tiene 46 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene dos hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. LUCHANDO POR UNA MISMA CAUSA, se encuentra ubicada en el en el Recinto La primavera, perteneciente al Canton Ventans, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Maria Mercedes se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz  y frejol, además se dedica a la cría de gallinas y cerdos. Las compras lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos, fertilizantes, urea, insecticidas para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito podrá sembrar maíz y arroz. El sueño es sembrar más hectareas de terreno para obtener mayores utilidades.

Le gusta hacer la limpieza en la casa y dedicarce a los cultivos.
texts.en:
Maria Mercedes is 46 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and children in Ventanas Canton, de los Ríos Province.  She has two children. 

The members of the communal bank "Luchando Por Una Misma Causa" (Fighting For the Same Cause) are located in the La Primavera precinct, which belongs to Ventanas Canton.  They makes their livings in short cycle agricultural labors, growing corn and rice.

Maria Mercedes makes her living in agriculture; she plants corn, rice and beans.  In addition, she raises chickens and pigs.  She makes her purchases in Ventanas.

Maria Mercedes is requesting the loan in order to plant corn and rice.  She needs to purchase supplies, like fertilizer, urea, and insecticides, for her crops.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to plant corn and rice.  Her dream is to plant more hectares of land and to earn a greater profit. 

Maria Mercedes likes to clean house and to take care of her plantings.

loans.use: to plant corn and rice and to purchase supplies, such as fertilizers, urea and insecticides, for her crops.

loans.name: Jean Damascene

texts.en: Jean Damascene sells trousers for men and has been in this business for eight years. With the requested loan, he wants to buy more trousers for resale. With the profits from his business, he plans to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more trousers for sale.

loans.name: Bonface

texts.en:
Bonface is 27 years old, married, and blessed with a three-year-old child. To earn a living, he uses his van for his transport business. He has operated the business for three years. Through Faulu Kenya, he has learned how to save his money. This has helped him to invest more in his business.
Bonface has requested a loan of 80,000 KES to service his van.

loans.use: to service his van.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en: Ruzanna is 21 years old. She lives in Spandarian village with her family: parents, 2 brothers, and younger sister. The family earns most of their income from agriculture: cattle breeding and farming. They also cultivate land, where they grow grass and use it as forage for the cattle. In order to make the grass cutting process faster and more effective, Ruzanna has applied for this loan to purchase a special machine. It is important to gather enough grass for the cattle and feed them properly during winter.

loans.use: to pay for a grass cutting machine.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en: Marissa is married with two children. She is 32 years old and lives in San Roque, Rizal. Marissa owns and operates a plot of farmland, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 2 years and earns 4,000 PHP each month. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase farm chemicals. Marissa is a new member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC. Marissa's plan is to save her returns in order to renovate their house.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

location.town: San Roque, Rizal Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Choun's Group

texts.en: Choun, 63, lives with her husband and four children in a rural village of the Sa Ang district, Cambodia. She has five children. To feed the family, Choun earns a living through farming rice while her spouse works as a paid worker to supplement the family’s income. They have been in this business for ten years. The current business earns them about KHR 10,000 per day to spend for the family’s needs. This is Choun’s group loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and her group has two members. She has been with VisionFund for two cycles and completely paid back the past loans, which have helped her to improve her family’s livelihood. As the leader, she is leading her group to apply for another loan with VisionFund. Choun is going to use her portion to buy materials (above-the-ground components) for building a proper toilet such as zinc, brick, slab, and pans. She hopes this loan will enable her to fulfill her dream of having a decent toilet for her family to use.

loans.use: to buy necessary materials for building a proper toilet.

loans.name: Cleofe

texts.en:
Cleofe is married with 4 children. Cleofe is 57 years old and lives in Palomoc, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
Cleofe grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase feeds and piglets.
Cleofe has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Cleofe hopes to raise more pigs.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and piglets.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.es:
Lilia tiene 37 años, es una mujer emprendedora, alegre y muy amble. Su pareja es Carlos, fruto de esa unión tienen dos hijos: Kelvin de 19 y Dumer de 9 años. Viven en su casa propia, la cual construyeron con mucho esfuerzo.

Su negocio es un restaurante. Lilia atiende a sus clientes con platos variados de la región como “juanes” (arroz envuelto en hojas) y diferentes platillos, para ello tiene un local alquilado, por el que paga un precio cómodo que le permite tener buenas ganancias. Lleva más de un año en ese local y cuenta con el apoyo de su hermana para atender al público. Ella se inició con la venta de jugos y luego comida, pero en una mesa como ambulante, ahora al tener un local ha sabido cómo ganar clientela. Es por eso que su deseo es comprar ese local, ya que está ubicado en una buena zona.

Este es su préstamo número 12 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues tiene un apoyo permanente de sus compañeros y asesor.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de mesas y sillas para mejorar la comodidad de sus clientes. También adquirirá los víveres e ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas, y gaseosas en cajas.
texts.en:
Lilia is 37 years old.  She is an enterprising, happy and very friendly woman.  Her partner's name is Carlos, and together they have two children: 19-year old Kelvin and 9-year old Dumer.  They live in their own home, which took a lot of effort for them to build. 

Lilia's business is a restaurant.  She offers her customers various regional dishes, like “juanes” (rice wrapped in leaves), and different small plates.  Lilia has rented a space for her restaurant.  She pays a reasonable rent which allows her a decent profit.  She has been in this space for more than a year, and her sister helps take care of the customers.  Lilia started out selling juice and then food from a street-side table.  Now that she has a place of business, she has learned how to build a clientele.  She hopes to purchase the space, as it is located in a good area. 

This is Lilia's 12th loan with MFP, and so she expects to meet her objectives.  She also says that she feels good about her communal bank.  She has permanent support from the other members and from her adviser.  

With the sum that she has requested of 1000 nuevos soles, ($400 USD), Lilia will invest in the purchase of tables and chairs for her customers' comfort.  She will also get provisions and ingredients for making the meals and boxes of soda.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs for her customers' comfort.  She will also get provisions and ingredients for making the meals and boxes of soda.

loans.name: Yobana

texts.es:
La socia es la señora Yobanna sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “RICCHARY CUSCO; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella sigue trabajando en un centro comercial de la ciudad del Cusco, ella sigue con la venta de pasteles y postres como por ejemplo tortas, kekes, gelatinas, flanes y pudin.  Además, ella es una mujer emprendedora que también  se dedica a la venta de CD's y DVD's. En esta oportunidad la socia requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como CD de música y DVD de películas. 

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member is Yobanna, who still belongs to the "Ricchary Cusco" communal bank. The communal bank  is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco, deparment of Cusco.
The member is in a common law marriage from which she has two children. She still works in a shopping center in the town of Cusco. She continues to sell pastries and desserts such as pies, cakes, jello, flan and pudding. Aside from that, she's an enterprising woman who also sells CDs and DVDs.
