He has a lot of customers, and they prefer him because they are satisfied with the quality of his products, the good prices, and, above all, the excellent service.

José is an exceptional man.  He is known for his great perseverance and his love for work.  His biggest goal is to be successful, and he is putting forth great effort to do that.
 
During this planting season he had some losses that he wants to recuperate.    However, he needs to buy supplies.  That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools, etc.  José Eduardo has good payment references and high moral character.   He affirms that he will repay the loan, and he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Gbedjromede Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GBEDJROMEDE est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Pierrette Sèwanoudé est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Pierrette Sèwanoudé est âgée de 59 ans et vit au Bénin. Pierrette Sèwanoudé n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pierrette Sèwanoudé est mariée à un certain Prosper. Le couple a cinq enfants tous scolarisés dont un reste à leur charge. Pierrette Sèwanoudé vit avec son enfant à charge. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Pierrette Sèwanoudé vend depuis douze ans, des amuses gueules à son domicile. Pierrette Sèwanoudé s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Pierrette Sèwanoudé sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GBEDJROMEDE, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group GBEDJROMEDE is composed of three persons who are friends. The group's representative, Pierrette Sèwanoudé, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 59 years old and lives in Benin. She did not attend school. She is married to a man named Prosper. The couple have five children, all educated. One of their children remains in their care. Pierrette Sèwanoudé lives with her dependent child. The couple jointly ensure that the different household expenses are covered.

To make sure the diverse household expenses are covered, Pierrette Sèwanoudé has been selling tasty snacks out her home for twelve years. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Pierrette Sèwanoudé is requesting, along with the other members of the group GBEDJROMEDE, a loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy tasty snacks

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz, tiene 31 años de trabajar en el rubro y se siente muy orgulloso porque eso le ha regalado experiencia muy valiosa que utiliza diariamente en su labor y la que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, un lugar apto para la siembra con suelo fértil, comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad y tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque vende producto de calidad a precios bajos, pero sobre todo por el buen servicio, él se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; Francisco es un hombre decidido y muy trabajador siempre esta a la expectativa de las oportunidades que le abrirán camino al éxito, se esfuerza día con día para alcanzar sus sueños, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, abono, herramienta, insecticida, etc. Francisco tiene buenas referencias de pago y asegura que pagara la deuda al mismo tiempo que le dará a su linda familia una mejor calidad de vida como se la merecen.
texts.en:
Francisco, 57 years of age, lives with his children in their own home. He works in agriculture, specifically the cultivation of corn, and he has been doing this for 31 years. He is very proud because his many years of work have given him very valuable experience that he uses daily in his work, which allows him to obtain the best harvests. The land that he cultivates is located in a very strong agricultural region, a perfect place for planting with fertile soil. He sells in the areas surrounding his community and he has many clients who prefer his goods as he sells quality products at a low price. More than anything, his clients appreciate the good service he provides, as he is an extremely friendly person. 

Francisco is a very dedicated and hardworking man who is always waiting for opportunities that will open his path to success. He works hard every day to achieve his dreams. In this planting season he would like to increase his production but he needs capital in order to be able to do so. As a result he is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, tools, and insecticide among other things. Francisco has good references and assures us that he will repay his debts while providing his family with the better quality of life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, tools and insecticide

loans.name: Luka

texts.en: Luka is 47 years old, married and the father of six children who range in age from eight to 23 years old. For the last 15 years, he has been in the motorcycle transport business and now earns a monthly income of KES. 20,000. He is applying for his first loan so he can repair his motorbikes and provide better service to his customers, and also buy a cart for transporting goods. The profit he earns will help him expand his business. His dream is to own a car in the near future.

loans.use: to repair his motorcycles so he can provide better service to his customers.

loans.name: Mwanalima

texts.en:
Mwanalima is 29 years old. She is married and lives in a small village in Kwale District with her family: her husband and her three children. She is the owner of a small business, a cafe that she has been operating for two years. She says she is doing very well. She works hard to provide her family with all that is necessary for a better life so that they will not be deprived of anything.

Mwanalima has requested the support of Kiva and Yehu to buy wheat flour and rice, and also to renovate the business premises.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour and rice, and also to renovate the business premises.

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано женщина в возрасте 45 лет, замужем, имеет пятерых детей. Муж на заработках в Российской федерации ,сын водит частное такси по городу. Сама Рано занимается мелкой торговлей леденцов и разных сладостей. Но этот доход очень маленький чтобы улучшить жизненные условия ,поэтому она впервые обращается к нам чтобы приобрести бытовую технику так как долгое время об этом мечтала. На полученный кредит хочет купить бытовые принадлежности которые очень необходимы для дома. А в погашение ей будет помогать её муж и сын. Она рада , что в кредит возможно осуществлять свои планы.
texts.en:
Rano is a 45-year-old married woman with five children. Her husband is working in the Russian Federation and her son drives a private taxi in the city. Rano herself is engaged in the sale of candy and various sweets. But this income is very little to improve her living conditions, so she is turning to us for the first time to buy home appliances since she has long dreamed of this. 

With the loan received, she wants to purchase household appliances that are needed for the house. It will also give her the chance to help her husband and son. She is glad that the loan is allowing her to carry out her plans.

loans.use: to purchase household appliances

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.es: María Antonia de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija en casa propia. Ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le ha permitido ganar experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener los mejores beneficios en las cosechas y por lo tanto un lugar adelante de la competencia,  el terreno esta ubicado en una zona apta para la siembra con suelo fértil y cerca de su vivienda, comercia en los alrededores y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, María es una mujer entregada a su labor, entusiasta, y muy responsable su mas grande secreto para llegar al éxito es el la perseverancia y el amor a lo que hace por eso se esfuerza al máximo,  en esta cosecha quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herbicida, insecticida, etc. María Antonia tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene una moral impecable asegura poder pagar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Antonia, 41 years of age, lives with her partner and daughter in their own home. She works cultivating corn and beans and has been working in agriculture for many years. This has permitted her to gain valuable experience that allows her to obtain the best harvests and remain a step ahead of the competition. The land is located in an area well-suited for agriculture, with fertile soil and close to her home. She sells in the surrounding areas and has many clients, as people know that everything she sells is of good quality, her prices are reasonable, and the service she provides is unequaled. 

María is a woman very dedicated to her work, enthusiastic, and very responsible, as her biggest secret to achieving success is perseverence and love for what she does. In this planting season she would like to increase her production, but she needs capital in order to be able to do so. She is therefore asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will enable her to buy corn seeds, beans, herbicide and insecticide among other things. María Antonia has good references and impeccable morals, and assures us that she will be able to repay her debts within the period established, while providing her family with a better quality of life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, herbicide and insecticide

loans.name: Maximiliano

texts.es: Maximiliano de cincuenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz tiene trece años de trabajar en la agricultura y ya tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro esto le ayuda a mantener la excelente calidad de sus cosechas, el terreno de cultivo se ubica en una zona de mucha incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad es muy conocido y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles  pero sobre todo lo caracteriza su gran amabilidad en el servicio; Maximiliano es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo, luchador, dispuesto a dar todo de si para alcanzar sus sueños, esta seguro que con esfuerzo y dedicación conseguirá el éxito, las temporadas de cosecha en algunas ocasiones son muy difíciles y en la anterior Maximiliano obtuvo perdidas por eso en esta época de siembra quiere recuperarse y comprar insumos pero necesita de suficiente capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, insecticida, herbicida, abono, etc. Maximiliano tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maximiliano, 53 years of age, lives with his partner and their children. He works cultivating corn and has worked in agriculture for the past 13 years. His many years of experience have helped him to maintain excellent quality harvests. The land that he cultivates is located in a high agricultural producing zone. He sells his goods in all of the surrounding areas of his community, and is very well known. He has many clients who prefer to buy from him because he always has what they need at reasonable prices, and he is very friendly in his service. 

Maximiliano is a very dedicated and hardworking man, ready to give everything he has to achieve his dreams. He is sure that with effort and dedication he will be able to achieve success. Occasionally planting seasons can be very difficult, and last season Maximiliano suffered losses. As a result, this season he would like to recover and buy the tools he needs to do so. He is asking for a loan from Apoyo Integral that will enable him to buy corn seeds, insecticide, herbicide, and fertilizer among other things. Maximiliano has good credit references and is certain that he will be able to repay his debt, all the while helping to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, insecticide, herbicide and fertilizer

loans.name: Norah

texts.en: Norah is 45 years old and earns a living by selling fruit in the town of Nakuru. She is married to a farmer and the mother of four children. She is applying for her first loan, which she will use to buy more fruit, such as oranges, mangoes and avocados, to sell to her customers. These items are in high demand and she will use the income she expects to earn to pay her children's school fees. In the future, Norah hopes to invest in a transport business, make more income and provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en: Mwanamisi is a widow and the mother of with three children, none of whom attend school. For the past five years, she has earned a living by running a grocery store where she sells a variety of products, including tomatoes, cabbages, and some fruit. Mwanamisi sells to neighbors and passersby. Her dream is to open a retail shop in future and hire employees. She lives in her own house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. With this loan, she will be able to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter has a hotel business in the town of Olkalau. He is 34 years old, married to a farmer and the father of two children who are one and four years old. He is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD, which he plans to use to buy flour and cooking fat. He will use the the additional profits he expects to earn to pay his children's school fees. In the future, Peter hopes to earn more money by buying a piece of land on which he will build commercial and residential houses.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour and cooking fat.

loans.name: Icyerekezo / Mshsh Group

texts.fr:
Emmanuel fait partie du groupe Icyerekezo / Mshsh. Le nom du groupe signifie « vision ». Il a 42 ans, il est marie, a 6 enfants de 2 ans à 17 ans, dont 4 scolarises. Son niveau d’éducation est de 8 ans de primaire.

Emmanuel est agriculteur des tomates. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter  des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.

Pour faire croitre son agriculture des tomates, il planifie de demande d’autre prêt pour finance ses activités et travailler beaucoup pour obtenir de grande quantité des tomates. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait devenir le meilleur cultivateur des tomates. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire pour ses enfants et améliore le niveau de manger dans sa famille.
texts.en:
Emmanuel is part of the group Icyerekezo / Mshsh. The group's name means "Vision". He is 42 years old and married, and he has six children, 2 to 17 years old, of whom four are in school. He has an 8th grade education.

Emmanuel is a tomato farmer. This loan cycle is his first one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy some fertilizers and to pay workers.

To expand his tomato farm, he plans to request more loans to finance his business and to work a lot to obtain large amounts of tomatoes. In the next few years, he would like to become the best tomato farmer. With the profits, he plans on covering the cost of his children's schooling and improving his family's food situation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay workers

loans.name: José Ángel

texts.es: José Ángel  de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene treinta años de trabajar en este rubro y se siente orgulloso de toda la experiencia obtenida porque eso le ayuda a obtener siempre las mejores cosechas  y a realizar su labor de forma excelente, el terreno de cultivo es arrendado y esta ubicado en una zona muy accesible cercana  a la carretera, comercia en todos lo alrededores de la comunidad y tiene mucha clientela fija pues las personas lo prefieren porque vende producto de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente, José Ángel es un hombre dedicado a su labor, responsable, honesto y muy humilde, tiene muchos objetivos por alcanzar y tiene la perseverancia para no rendirse y alcanzar el triunfo, en estas fechas de siembra José quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita capital de inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herramientas, etc. José Ángel tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
José Ángel, 52 years of age, lives with his wife and their children. He works in agriculture, specifically the cultivation of corn and beans, and has been doing so for 33 years. He is very proud of the experience he has gained because it helps him to obtain the best harvests and complete his work in the best way possible. The land that he cultivates is leased and is located in a very accessible area near the highway. He sells in all of the areas surrounding his community, and he has many stable clients as people know he sells high quality products, at reasonable prices, and with excellent service. 

José Ángel is a very dedicated, responsible, honest and humble man. He has a very strong desire to get ahead and he has the perseverence not to give up and to achieve his goals. In this planting season, José would like to increase his production but he needs investment capital in order to do so. As a result he is asking for a loan from Apoyo Integral that will permit him to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools among other things. José Ángel has good credit references and is certain that he will be able to repay his debt when it is due, all the while giving his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizer, insecticide and tools

loans.name: Murodbek

texts.ru: Муродбек 35 летний трудолюбивый человек. Он женат, но не имеет детей. Более 10 лет он занимается скотоводством и выращиванием пщеницы. Скотоводство является его основным бизнесом и дает достаточного дохода для содержания семьи. Он покупает корову, присматривает за ним 2 месяца и продает на местном рынке. Благодаря его упорному труду его бизнес развивается год за годом. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Она откармливает коров в 2 раза в день. Муродбек еще занимается выращиванием пшеницы. Полученный урожай он продает местным жителям. Он хочет развевать свой бизнес, но не имеет средства для этого. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки коровы. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Murodbek is a 35-year-old, hardworking person. He is married but does not have children. 

He has been engaged in cattle breeding and growing wheat for more than ten years. Cattle breeding is his core business and provides sufficient income for keeping her family. He buys a cows, looks after it for two months, and sells it in the local market. Thanks to his hard work, his business has grown year after year. His wife helps him in the business. She feeds the cows two times per day. Murodbek is still engaged in growing wheat. He sells the resulting crop to local residents. 

He wants to develop his business, but does not have the means to do so. He is requesting a loan of $3,000 to buy a cow. He is awaiting your goodwill.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Abaticumugambi / Mshsh Group

texts.fr:
Félix fait partie du groupe Abaticumugambi / Mshsh. Le nom du groupe signifie «Fidèle». Il a 30 ans, il est marie avec 2 enfants de 1 ans à 4 ans. Il a 2 personnes en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Félix est agriculteur des tomates. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter  des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.

Pour faire croitre son agriculture des tomates, il planifie de demande d’autre prêt pour finance ses activités et travailler beaucoup pour obtenir de grande quantité des tomates. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait devenir grand fournisseur des tomates. Avec les profits, il prévoit de construire une belle maison.
texts.en:
Félix is part of the group Abaticumugambi / Mshsh. The group's name means "Loyal" or "Faithful". He is 30 years old and married, and he has two children, 1 and 4 years old. He has two persons to support aside from his children. He has a 6th grade education.

Félix is a tomato farmer. This loan cycle is his first one with the microfinance institution ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy some fertilizers and to pay workers.

To expand his tomato farm, he plans to request more loans to finance his business and to work a lot to obtain large amounts of tomatoes. In the next few years, he would like to become a major supplier of tomatoes. With the profits, he plans on building a nice house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay for labor

loans.name: Fabian

texts.es: Fabián de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene once años de experiencia en la agricultura y eso le ha colaborado para obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola y esta cercano a su vivienda, comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles y con producto de calidad además su servicio es característico por su gran amabilidad, Fabián es un hombre decidido, muy trabajador buscando siempre oportunidades que le den paso a un futuro mas prospero, quiere alcanzar el éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Fabián tiene buenas referencias de pago y asegura poder saldar la deuda y al mismo tiempo darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Fabián, 47 years old, lives with his wife and their children in their own home. He works cultivating corn, and has 11 years of agricultural experience which allows him to always obtain the best harvests. The land that he cultivates is located in an agricultural zone close to where he lives. He sells in the areas surrounding his community, and has many clients as people know he sells high quality products at reasonable prices, and that his service is very friendly. 

Fabián is a very dedicated and hardworking man, always looking for opportunities that will lead him to a more prosperous future. He would like to be succesful and is not going to give up until achieving success. In this planting season he would like to increase his crop production, but he needs to invest in order to do so. As a result, he is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will enable him to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and tools among other things. Fabián has good credit references and has assured us that he will be able to repay his debt, all the while working towards providing a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and tools

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor Manuel  de veintiuno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de ajonjolí y maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se siente muy orgulloso de toda la experiencia ganada pues es la que le ayuda a mantener las mejores cosechas mejorando cada ves mas la calidad de su labor, el terreno esta ubicado en una zona accesible con suelo fértil y cerca de su vivienda, Víctor es un hombre dedicado a su labor, responsable, honesto pero sobre todo motivado a dar todo de si para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumenta la producción pues así podrá aumentar sus ganancias pero para ello necesita capital para invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar  semilla de maíz, ajonjolí, herbicida, herramienta, etc. Víctor Manuel tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que cancelara y al mismo tiempo le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Víctor Manuel, 21 years old, lives with his wife and their children in their own home. He works cultivating sesame seeds and corn, and has worked in agriculture for many years. He is proud of the experience that he has earned as it helps him to maintain the best harvests, each season improving the quality of his work. The land that he cultivates is located in a very accessible and fertile area close to where he lives.   

Víctor is a very dedicated, responsible, and honest man, motivated to give everything he has to be successful. He would like to increase his production and improve his earnings, but in order to do so needs capital to invest. He is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will permit him to buy corn seeds, sesame seeds, herbicide and tools among other things. Víctor Manuel has good credit references and is certain that he will be able to pay back his debt on time, all the while providing his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, sesame seeds, herbicide and tools

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La Sra. Maria es viuda y no tiene dependientes económicos, ella recibe una pension económica, pero además de eso tiene un negocio de venta de comida el cual esta ubicado en uno de los gimnasios de la localidad. Ella sabe que tiene que tener su negocio muy bien surtido ya que vienen grandes eventos al gimnasio por lo tanto aumentan los clientes. Es por eso que ella pide de nuestra ayuda en esta ocasión para surtir su negocio con mercancía y ofrecer una mejor y mas variedad de productos.
texts.en: Maria is a widow and has no dependents to support.  She receives a pension herself, but she also has a prepared food business, located in one of the local gyms.  She knows that she must keep her business well stocked because there are large events held at the gym and her customers increase in number.  It’s for this reason that she is requesting our help to be able to stock her business and offer a greater variety to her customers.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 40 kg of fertilizers and to pay workers

loans.name: Shahzodakhon

texts.ru: Шахзодахон очень трудолюбивый человек. Ей 30 лет и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Она одна воспитывает и обеспечивает своих  детей  так как она развелась с мужем. Трудное экономическое состояние семьи заставила ее начать свой бизнес. Она начинала бизнес с продажей женской одежды и обуви и в этом помогла ей ее мать. Она является одной из успешных предпринимательниц, так как она обновляет свой ассортимент каждый сезон. Таким путем она придерживает своих клиентов. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 2500 долларов США для покупки женской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shahzodakhon is a very hardworking person.  She is 30 years and raising two children.  She is raising and providing for her children by herself because she got divorced from her husband.  The family's difficult economic situation forced her to start this business.  She started the business with the sales of women's clothing and shoes, and her mother helped her.  Shahzodakhon is one of the successful entrepreneurs because she updates her merchandise selection every season.  This is how she is able to retain her customers.  Shahzodakhon is requesting a loan in the amount of $2500 to purchase women's clothing for the new season.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase seasonable women's clothing

loans.name: Lydiah

texts.en:
Lydiah has a retail shop in Naivasha town and has operated it for five years. She is 37 years old and a single mother of two children.

This will be her third loan and she plans to use the loan amount to buy more stock of maize flour, sugar, rice and cooking fat for sale in her shop. With the anticipated income she plans to buy a motorcycle and start a transportation business.

In the future, Lydiah hopes to grow her business, make more income and provide for a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of maize flour, sugar, rice and cooking fat for sale in her shop.

loans.name: Sanavbar

texts.en:
Sanavbar is 48 years old. She is married and has three children.

Eight years ago her living condition caused her to organize her own business. In this way she began her own business deal with animal husbandry. Now, she is one of the best and most successful business women in the local market. She buys cows, cares of them for 2 or 3 months, and then sells them to local people. Thanks to her planning, her cows are fat and attract a lot of customers. She wants to buy more cows for developing her business, but she does not have the money for it.

She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Tajikistan Somonis (TJS) to buy cows. In this way she will provide her family with high quality of living conditions. Moreover, she will enter her children in good schools. She promises to make her payments on time. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and herbicide

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José Antonio de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y jocote,  tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro  y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a encontrar buenas estrategias para mejorar su labor y obtener siempre excelentes cosechas, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona estratégica con suelo fértil para la siembra, comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija, siempre buscan su producto, porque es de buena calidad y a precios accesibles además él se caracteriza por su servicio único, siempre trata a los clientes con gran amabilidad; José es un hombre laborioso y motivado su mas grande secreto para alcanzar el éxito es la perseverancia. En esta época de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, jocote, insecticida, herbicida, etc. José Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago y buena moral asegura cancelar la deuda y a la ves busca ofrecerle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
José Antonio, 48 years old, lives with his wife and their children. He works cultivating corn and jocote (cashew-like plant), and he has done so for many years. The experience he has gained has allowed him to find good strategies to improve his work and obtain excellent harvests. The land that he cultivates is located in a strategic area with fertile soil for cultivation. He sells his products in the surrounding communities, and he has many loyal clients who buy from him for his good quality products, reasonable prices, unequalled service, and friendly demeanor. 

José is a hardworking man and is motivated by perseverence to achieve success. This planting season he would like to increase his production, but he needs capital in order to be able to do so. He is asking for a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy corn seeds, jocote, insecticide and herbicide among other things. José Antonio has good repayment references and he assures that he will be able to repay his debt on time, all the while looking for ways to offer his family the better quality of life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, jocote (cashew-like) seeds, insecticide and herbicide

loans.name: Jumagul

texts.ru: Чумагул родилась 1958 году в Вахдате. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Чумагул более пяти лет занимается шитьем платьев. В этой области она имеет богатый опыт. Чумагул работает портнихой в ателье. Она хочет у себя дома заняться шитьем. Чумагул просит кредит для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en:
Jumagul was born in 1958 in Vahdat. She is married and has two children. 

Jumagul has been engaged in sewing dresses for more than five years. She has rich experience in this area. Jumagul works as a dressmaker in a studio. 

She wants to engage in sewing in her own home. Jumagul is requesting a loan to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Khursheda

texts.ru: Хуршеда 41 летняя женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Ее дети оба являются несовершеннолетними. Несколько лет тому назад у Хуршеды была очень трудная условия жизни. Она развелась с первым мужем, так как они не сошлись с характерами. Она осталась с одним ребенком и работала в школе учительницей. У нее была очень маленькая зарплата. После того как она вышла замуж во второй раз, она с новыми надеждами начила свой бизнес скотоводством. Ее муж помогает ей в ведении бизнеса. Они покупают корову, присматривают за ним 2 или 3 месяца и потом продают на местном рынке. Хуршеда хочет отремонтировать дом, но не имеет средства для этого. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов. Она обещает заплатить кредит во время. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Khursheda is a 41-year-old woman. She is married and is raising two children. Her children are both minors. 

A few years ago, Khursheda was experiencing very difficult living conditions. She divorced her first husband, as they were not compatible in character. She was left with one infant and worked as a schoolteacher. She had a very small salary. 

After she married a second time with new hopes, she started a business raising livestock. Her husband helps her in the business. They buy a cow, take care of it for two or three months, and then sell it in the local market. 

Khursheda wants to repair her home, but she does not have the means to do so. She is asking for a loan of 6,000 сомони to buy construction materials. She promises to pay the loan on time. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cement, paint, and wood for repairing her house

loans.name: Amanda Victoria

texts.es: Amanda Victoria de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro y eso le permite siempre obtener las mejores cosechas, es muy conocido en la zona pues su trabajo es de los mejores del lugar, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, con suelo fértil y favorable para la siembra, comercia en todos los lugares aledaños y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es único siempre esta a la expectativa de lo que desean las personas; Amanda es una mujer entregada a su trabajo dispuesta a trabajar duro para alcanzar sus objetivos, su mas grande secreto es la constancia y el amor a su labor sabe que así alcanzara el éxito, quiere aumentar su producción para aumentar al mismo tiempo sus ganancias pero necesita capital para invertir en insumos  por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, insecticida, abono, etc. Amanda Victoria es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Amanda Victoria is fifty years old, she lives with her children. 

She works in agriculture, specially growing corn and sorghum. She has lots of experience in this field and that allows her to always get the best harvests.

She is well-known in the zone because her work es one of the best of the place. Her farming land is located in a zone of high agricultural presence, with fertile soil, favorable for the sowing. She sells in all the surrounding areas and has a lot of customers that prefer her because she always has what people need with quality products and affordable prices, also her service is unique, she is always on the lookout for the things people want.

Amanda is a woman who gives herself to her job and she is willing to work hard to reach her goals. Her biggest secret is perseverance and the love she has for her work, she knows that this is the way to reach success. 

She wants to increase her production to, at the same time, increase her profit but she needs capital to invest in supplies and that is why she requests a loan with "Integral" that will allow her to buy corn seed, sorghum, insect-killer, fertilizer, etc. 

Amanda Victoria is very responsible and has good payment references, she assures that she will be able to pay her debt and at the same time she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, sorghum, insect-killer, fertiliser.

loans.name: Saidrahmon

texts.ru: Саидрахмон трудолюбивый и приятный молодой человек. Ему 21 года. Саидрахмон еще не женился  и живет вмести с родителями. Его старший брат помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Уже более 5 лет как Саидрахмон занимается скотоводством. Он покупает корову, следит за ним месяц и продает на местном рынке. Благодаря его упорному труду его скот имеет хорошее состояние и привлекает множество покупателей. Саидрахмон хочет развевать свой бизнес, но не имеет денег для этого. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 долларов США с целью покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Saidrahmon is a hardworking and pleasant young person.  He is 21 years old.  Saidrahmon has not yet gotten married and lives with his parents.  His older brother helps him with running the business.  Saidrahmon has been involved in animal husbandry for over five years already.  He buys a cow, takes care of it for a month and then sells it at a local market.  Thanks to his persistent work, his livestock is in good condition and attracts many buyers.  Saidrahmon wants to develop his business, but does not have money for it.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of $3000 to buy livestock.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena de sesenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su nieto, ella se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos especialmente maíz y frijol, tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia que le da la oportunidad  de obtener buenas cosechas y de mantenerse al mismo tiempo adelante de la competencia, el terreno donde realiza sus cultivos es arrendado y esta ubicado en una zona accesible cerca de la carretera, los productos de la siembra los comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, tiene mucha clientela fiel que la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que las personas desean a precios bajos y con un muy buen servicio; Elena es una mujer trabajadora,  enérgica y responsable, le gusta luchar por sus sueños y no piensa rendirse planea alcanzar el éxito, en esta cosecha quiere aumentar la producción porque así lograra aumentar las ganancias pero necesita de capital para comprar insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Elena tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Elena is 69 years old and lives with her grandson. She works cultivating basic grains, specifically corn and beans. She has been working in agriculture for many years, and her significant experience allows her to obtain good harvests and remain ahead of the competition. The land that she works is leased and located in an easily accessible area close to the highway. She sells her products in the areas surrounding her community, and she has many loyal clients who prefer to work with her for her low prices and good service. 

Elena is very hardworking, energetic, and responsible. She enjoys fighting for her dreams and she would never dream of giving up before reaching them. This planting season she would like to improve her earnings, but she needs investment capital in order to buy the inputs she needs. She is asking for a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizer, insecticide and other tools. Elena has good references and is certain that she will be able to repay her debt, at the same time giving her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizer, insecticide and tools

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Victor is 20 years old and single. He has a movie selling business, a small cyber cafe and a barber shop. He also sells phone accessories and it has been profitable.

This being his second loan, he plans to buy phone accessories and movies to sell. He also plans to buy one computer and add to his cyber cafe.


In the future Victor plans to supply movies to various traders as well as open another barber shop.

loans.use: To buy more stock of movies and phone accessories.

loans.name: Isaack

texts.en:
Isaack is 49 years old. He is married to Loise and together they have two children. He is a dairy farmer and has been in the business for the past two years. He gets a monthly income of KES 15,000 from his business.

This is his sixth loan from KADET LTD. He repaid his previous loans well and in good time. He was introduced by a field officer. He will use the loan amount to purchase two dairy cattle to rear for milk production.

He hopes to increase milk production by building a zero grazing unit for his cows.

loans.use: To buy two dairy cattle.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 62 years old, comes from Nakuru, and is married with seven children aged between 23 years and 10 years old.

Joseph has a business selling shoes which he has been doing for the past four years. Joseph has applied for his second loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy more shoes to add to his stock.

He hopes to educate all his children to university level in the near future.

loans.use: To buy more shoes for sale.

loans.name: Lolakhon

texts.ru: Лолахон 48 летняя красивая женщина. Она мать 6 прекрасных детей и любящая жена для своего мужа. Ее муж водитель и не имеет достаточного средства для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. С целью семейного благополучия уже более 21 года Лолахон занимается торговлей. В начале, она занималась купле продажей тканей, но большой спрос к продуктам питания заставила ее изменить бизнес. На сегодняшний день она продает продукты питания как сахар, масло, хлеб, консервы и т.п. в собственном магазине, который находится в центре города. Она запрашивает кредит на сумму 10000 сомони с целью покупки сахара, масла, разнообразных колбасных изделий и консервы для пополнения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Lolakhon is a 48 year-old handsome woman.  She is a mother of six beautiful children and a loving wife for her husband.  Her husband is a driver and does not have sufficient means to provide for the family with all of the necessities.  To achieve the goal of family welfare, Lolakhon has been involved in sales for over 21 years.  At first, she was involved in selling fabrics, but a high demand for food products forced her to change her business.  Today, she sells food products, such as sugar, butter, bread, canned goods and the like, in her own store, located in the city center.  Lolakhon is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni to purchase sugar, butter, various sausages and canned goods in order to refill her working capital.  She awaits our helps and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, butter, various sausages and canned goods in order to refill her working capital

loans.name: Amen Plus Group

texts.en:
Thade is the chairman of the Community Bank named “Amen Plus” which is composed of 15 members united in solidarity for receiving Kiva loans with the goal of developing their businesses.

Thade, 60, became a micro-entrepreneur in 2005. He manages his own general store in the East of Kinshasa. He works hard with good management skills in order to realize his dream of one day opening a large store in his area. His business generates a profit of US$60 per week. 

Thade is a trustworthy client of MFI HOPE RDC, having eleven times received and correctly repaid loans. He will increase his stock of merchandise with his next loan by purchasing, soap, vegetable oil, and sacks of rice and reselling them at a profit. Thade is a widower and the father of five children aged between 21 and 32 years old.

loans.use: to increase the store’s stock by buying soap, vegetable oil, and sacks of rice to resell at a profit.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 28 years old and is a single lady, living alone. Lydia has a call centre where people make both local and international calls. She has been running this business for the last one year with income. 


She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her to have enough float which will enable her to serve her clients better.

She hopes to have enough capital in the near future.

loans.use: To increase her capital for business float.

loans.name: Claudia Raquel

texts.es: La Sra. Claudia de 38 años de edad es casada y tiene 4 hijos, su esposo trabaja como guardia de seguridad  en una constructora de la localidad y ella tiene un negocio de venta de abarrotes. Poco a poco ha mejorado su negocio invirtiendo en la mejora del local pero en esta ocasión ella pide de nuestra ayuda para terminar algunos detalles interiores de su domicilio para ofrecerles a sus hijos y esposo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Claudia is 38 years old, married, and has four children. Her husband works as a security guard at a construction business in their town and she has a grocery shop. Over the years, she has been improving her business by investing to make the shop nicer. This time, however, she asks for the field partner's help in order to finish some minor repairs in her home so as to bring her children and spouse a better quality of life.

loans.use: to finish minor repairs at her home.

loans.name: Abdusattor

texts.ru: Абдусаттор проживает в районе Спитамен.Ему 45 лет,женат и у  него 4 детей.В районе его знают многие потому что он вкусно готовит наши национальные блюда.Поэтому в 2005 году в поисках источника дохода он открыл столовую напротив рынка и у него много постоянных клиентов.Ему помогают его сыновья и жена а на полученные доходы он построил дом и отремонтировал а также купил автомашину.Кроме этого бизнеса он выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Абдусаттор хочет  расширить свой бизнес и планирует купить аппарат по производству мороженного и несколько мешков риса а так же масло.Поэтому  он обратился в нашу организацию с целью получения кредита и надеется на нашу поддержку.
texts.en: Abdusattor lives in the Spitamen district.  He is 45 years old, married and has four children.  Many people in the district know him because he cooks delicious national dishes.  This is why, in search of a source of income, he opened a cafe across from a market in 2005 and now has many regular customers.  His sons and wife help him with the business, and he used his earnings to build and repair a house and also bought a car.  Besides this business, he grows agricultural crops.  Abdusattor wants to expand his business and plans to purchase ice-cream-making equipment and several bags of rice and also butter.  This is why he came to our organization to request a loan and relies on our support.

loans.use: to purchase ice-cream-making equipment and several bags of rice and also butter

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 52 years old and is married with one child who is in school. He has been farming profitably for the last ten years.

Patrick has applied for his fourth loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy fertilizer and seedlings to use on his farm. He hopes to be the leading farmer in his area.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Timothy

texts.en:
Timothy used his previous loan amount to buy fertilizer, seedlings, and herbicides, and it has been profitable. This will be his second loan and he plans to use the amount to buy fertilizer and seedlings for planting during this planting season.

With the anticipated income, he plans to expand his farming by buying more farm inputs.

In the future, Timothy hopes to do large-scale farming and make more income.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зульфия 34 года,замужем имеет 4 детей. В поисках источника дохода в 2005 году она начала свой бизнес, поначалу Зульфия купила место в продовольственном рынке и продавало выпечки и печенье.Благодаря настойчивости и упорному труду  она сумела  расширить свой магазин и ассортимент товаров.А на полученный доход хорошо отремонтировала квартиру,а так же  оплачивает учебы своих детей.Это является единственным доходом для семьи поэтому Зульфия  хочет расширить свой товарооборот и надеется на нашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Zulfiya is 34 years old, married and has four children.  In search of a source of income, she started her own business in 2005.  At first, Zulfiya bought a place at a food market and sold baked goods and cookies there.  Thanks to persistence and hard work, she was able to expand her store and product selection.  And used her earnings to repair her apartment well and also to pay for her children's education.  This is the family's sole source of income, and this is why Zulfiya wants to increase her goods turnover and relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to increase her goods turnover

loans.name: Nchoe

texts.en:
Nchoe is 48 years and is married with two children, who are in secondary school.

Nchoe has a business selling goats and has applied for his second loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy a motorbike. This will help him as he travels from his home to the Suswa area to meet livestock traders.

He hopes to have enough capital in the near future.

loans.use: To enable him to buy a motorbike for transportation

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: El señor Daniel pide apoyo para terminar la construcción que empezó con ahorros propios pero al no ser suficientes no desea dejar la obra inconclusa y seguir creciendo la casa así como la construcción de lo que son paredes y divisiones del cuarto y mas adelante poder echar la losa. El principal beneficio será la comodidad que les brindara a los integrantes de la familia ya que desea que sus hijos tengan una habitación propia para que no tenga que estar tan apretados como hasta ahora. El actualmente tiene dos empleos uno para una empresa como alijador y en el otro como instructor de banda mientras que su esposa trabaja en Laredo Texas como secretaria de una bodega; ambos aportan para pagar los gastos así como en la manutención de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Daniel asks for support to finish the building that he started with his own savings, but because they weren't enough he doesn't want to leave the work unfinished and [he also wants] to keep making the house bigger and to build the walls and dividers of the room so in the future he can put up the tiling.

The first benefit [of building the extra room] will be the comfort it will bring to the members of the family, because he wants his children to have their own room so they don't have to be as cramped as they have been so far.

At the moment he has two jobs, one in a company as an "Alijador" [He who separates the seed from cotton wool] and another as a band instructor whilst his wife works in Laredo, Texas as a secretary for a warehouse. They both contribute to pay for their expenses and the maintainance of their children.

loans.use: to finish building a room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional stock for his shop.

loans.name: Hope

texts.en:
Hope is 38 years old and married, with three children. 

She works hard to provide for her family by running a livestock selling business, where she buys and sells chickens. Hope has requested a KES 50,000 loan through Yehu to buy young chickens for breeding and chicken feed. Hope says that she gets her young chickens from nearby villages and then breeds them for some days before selling them.

Hope has borrowed and repaid two loans from Yehu before this. She has been running the business for the last three years. Hope aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy young chickens for breeding and chicken feed.

loans.name: Bantoma Plus Group

texts.en:
Bernard is a leader of a community bank named Bantoma Plus, which is composed of 10 microentrepreneurs united in solidarity to receive loans from Kiva through IMF HOPE DRC with the goal of developing their businesses. 

Bernard, 42, runs a cybercafé. He has been in business since 2011. He is working hard because his ambition is to expand his business in his area. As he wants to develop and diversify his business, he has decided to join one of Hope’s groups. He is planning with the next loan to purchase a copy machine for his business in order to increase his working capital. He makes a profit of about $20 per day. Bernard has succeeded with good strategies to build up permanent customers. He always talks with his customers. He knows them well and by their names, and he never runs out of supplies. He is married and the father of five children whose ages vary between 4 and 19 years old. Four of them attend school.

loans.use: To purchase a copy machine for his business

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is a married lady, aged 32 years old. She is blessed with four children, aged 12, 9, 4, and 1 year old. She is a mixed farmer in the Nkareta area and has been running the business for two years. She earns a monthly income of KES 18,000.

She has borrowed a second loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD which she intends to use to purchase farm inputs for the business. 

The anticipated profit will be used to pay school fees for her school-going children. Her dreams are to improve her living standards and own her residential plot.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.
